document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 93-01
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON REGULATING THE USE OF PUBLIC AND PRIVATE SEWERS, PROVIDING PERMITS FOR THE INSTALLATION AND CONNECTION OF SANITARY SEWERS, REGULATING THE DISCHARGE OF WATERS AND WASTES INTO THE PUBLIC SEWER SYSTEM, AND PROVIDING PENALTIES FOR THE VIOLATION OF THE PROVISIONS HEREOF; DETERMINATION OF EXEMPTION FROM CEQA REQUIREMENTS
